The g and h distribution
X = A + BG(Z)H(Z)
```{r}
Q_gk<-function(z,A,B,g,k,c){
 A + B*(1 + c*tanh(g*z/2))*z*(1 + z^2)
}
Q_qk<-function(z,A,B,g,h,c){
 A + B*(1 + c*tanh(g*z/2))*z*exp(h*z^2/2)
}
z<-rnorm(100)
gk_1<-data.table(gk=Q_gk(z,1,2,1,1,1))
```
```{r}
gk_1 %>% ggplot + aes(x=gk) + geom_histogram()
```
